code: const SummaryReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{visible:false};let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"SHOW_SUMMARY":state={visible:true};return state;case"HIDE_SUMMARY":state={visible:false};return state;default:return state;}};export default SummaryReducer;
